# doit_organizations (Data Source)

Organizations help you segment data by your company or team structure.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve all organizations
data "doit_organizations" "all" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `organizations` (Attributes List) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--organizations))
- `row_count` (Number) Organizations row count

<a id="nestedatt--organizations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `organizations`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The unique ID of the organization
- `name` (String) The name of the organization
